title: Peri peri roast chicken
description: A spicy and different way to cook a roast chicken, this can be as hot as you like. Just increase the quantities of chilli and Tabasco sauce.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
150ml/5fl oz water, chicken stock or red wine
1-5 red chillies (as hot as you dare!)
25ml/1 fl oz white or red wine vinegar
1-2 tbsp Tabasco (again as hot as you dare!)
1 tsp caster sugar (or a squidge of honey)
